memories.text: Aurora researches quantum networks and writes concise technical notes.
She keeps a journal about her alpine climbs every summer.
Aurora enjoys composing minimalist piano pieces in her free time.

memories.text: Boreal documents forest canopy health using drone imagery.
He catalogs rare lichens discovered during expeditions.
Boreal designs interactive data visualizations for conservation teams.
